summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a roster with names and assignments, notably listing Jeffrey Epstein by his inmate registration number with a 'SUICIDE OR' watch status.

persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster by his registration number 89673-053 with assignment 'HOSP' and a 'SUICIDE OR' watch status.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total census of 758 inmates verified against a count of 754.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate roster shows Jeffrey Epstein (reg. 89673-053) was assigned to 'HOSP' with a 'SUICIDE OR' watch status on this date.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in his jail cell.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed on the inmate roster by his Bureau of Prisons registration number 89673-053.
Epstein's roster entry shows an assignment of 'HOSP' and a status of 'SUICIDE OR', indicating he was on a suicide watch or observation status.
The official inmate count for the facility recorded a total census of 758 inmates.
The document is a routine administrative prison record, capturing the institutional status and count procedures on a critical date.
